name: Lost in Pace
description:
LOST IN PACE V 1.0.0

This is the first 3D game I ever made. It is a car racing game where you can select from 4 cars and race against AI or play multiplayer against your friends!

There is only one Race Track that you and your friends can race.

If there are not enough players in the online game bot will join your game.

Offline mode is also a race against bots.

Controls

The game requires still some tuning I hope you gonna have some understanding. It is still early beta. My goal is to update the game monthly. I hope you gonna enjoy it and stay on this road with me. Thanks!

GAMEPLAY:

Assets are bought on Unity Asset Store and Audio is from Envato elements.

I hope you gonna enjoy the game!
